Name: Hot Rum Punch
Ingredients: 30 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Place bar spoon in warmed glass. Add ingredients and STIR.
History: Punch was one of the many rum-based drinks popular in the 18th century when taverns would serve cold punch and warm it upon request by dunking a red-hot iron in it. This version is said to have been a favourite drink of Mozart the composer.
Nutrition: One serving of Hot Rum Punch contains 174 calories
